name: QuitePeople
tag_list: deals, travel, coupons, daily-deals, travel-deals, travel-coupon, travel-discount
overview:
QuitePeople’s customers may have the best quality: we offer a more selective service targeting to a user looking for the most demanding travel without surprises and cheap prices. The saving in this case ranges from 30% to 50% and the standard quality remains high.

The greatest problem pointed out in this type of market is precisely the quality that is often poor. The forced compromise in these projects based its strength just on discounting. QuitePeople aims to create value both for our partners/providers and for users who purchase deals. Customers will benefit from the packages advertised by our service at exclusive rates, while our trading partners will have access to a visibility that a short time ago was costly and wasteful.

The deals are divided into categories: Italy, Europe, Sea, Mountain, Farm, Spa, Cruise, Last Minute and price ranges, so as to be meet all budgets and tastes of users. QuitePeople is an Italian company that aims to become a leader in Europe.
